column2: "Not here, either. Geez, where has she run off to now?"
"She's keeps running off without letting me know where. It's such a pain."
"And then there's Xiao, practically with Ulc 24-7 these days ...good grief."
"When Maria disappears, she always manages to bring back more trouble for me!"
"So don't get it confused! I'm not lonely or worried about her in the slightest!"
